name: Space Stuff (antonsutherland)
description:
A mini game developed for the "Game Design and Development" course.

Changes made:

  1. Designed 3 new complete levels, the last level is a boss fight;
  2. New menu music is created;
  3. Extended menu screen with additional info about game pickups;
  4. Boss-fight is a puzzle with programmed object behavior: interaction is needed to defeat the boss.

Made by: A. Malarev & Sutherlandgames
